website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful and functional mat from an eco-conscious company.
pros: Made of natural rubber and cork
Great for sweaty workouts and hot yoga
Company plants a tree for every mat sold
cons: Very rare complaints of poor grip

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love this yoga mat ! Awesome for hot yoga.
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga mat so much I got a second one for when friends visit . I practice Bikram and hot vinyasa, as well as non hot yoga at home.... i sweat buckets and this mat stays grippy underfoot . Best yoga mat I have ever purchased, and I have gone through probably 50 in my day ! :)
customer_reviews.author: flexiest

customer_reviews.title: Fading colors
customer_reviews.text: Its been only one month with probably 6 times used indoors and the colors of chakras are fading. Withing next month its just going to be cork yoga mat. Also the design for Chakras is incorrect! Don't waste your money buying this product, look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Devin Gala

customer_reviews.title: The best yoga mat ever!
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing yoga mat I’ve ever owned. I used it for the first time in a Yin class and I was shocked at how soft and grippy it is. It will be the only brand of mat that I buy or recommend to my yoga students from here forward. I can’t believe you plant a tree for every mat sold, that is truly incredible. I would love to see bulk discounts for yoga teachers as I’d love to buy more for my class.
customer_reviews.author: Danyell Browne

customer_reviews.title: This mat will align your chakras
customer_reviews.text: I treated myself to this mat and I’m so glad I did. $60 seems a lot for a yoga mat but it feels expensive and durable. I love the way the cork feels during asana. It is pretty heavy compared to a traditional mat but it’s worth the extra weight.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth and Chris’ baby shower registery

customer_reviews.title: it's beautiful.  get one.
customer_reviews.text: Bought and started using for hot yoga just before COVID hit. That killed my efforts for the last month. So haven't used enough to assess durability, but it feels very well made. And it's really attractive. It had good traction when damp for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard of Flatland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicest yoga mats I have seen and I get plenty of compliments. Was reluctant to spend this money on a yoga mat but knew I wants an all natural product and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Buskirk

customer_reviews.title: The whole mat is calming and functional
customer_reviews.text: The cork yoga mat is visually appealing and feels real earthy, it is smooth but nothing to be alarmed at as it has a unique texture that is friendly before sweating and during Cascades of sweat, when Im ready to wipe it down I use a moist cloth rinsed in water and applecider vinegar and let it dry..the best part is letting it dry so peaceful looking..and beautiful printed chakra yantras..very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: particlegirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far! Lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mat! (I got the elephant print) Is thick enough where my knees do not hurt and love that it is naturally anti microbial for easy clean. Got a lot of compliments in yoga class! I have only tried in yin classes so far so I do not know how it works in hot yoga. This does not have a sticky feel to it. It feels just like a cork board, but is supposed to give you enough grip when you sweat. I’ll be back to review after using it in ashtanga and hot yoga.
customer_reviews.author: CFollen

customer_reviews.title: Loving this Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: I went on a limb and bought a little more expensive yoga mat because I really liked the design! But I actually love the mat! One thing I didn’t know is that it is dual purpose and I can turn it over for my exercises!! I use this every day now!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Peters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mat. The feel of it is amazing and I love the chakra symbols. Absolutely delightful. I find the mat to have a great grip, no slippage.
customer_reviews.author: Razalas

customer_reviews.title: Top choice by a Yoga Therapist and Teacher
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga mat! It has everything! The elephant design is exquisite! My feet, knees and wrist love it! It is so soft and comfy! No chemical smells! It rolls up nicely and easily for going from home to studio. As an E500 RYT and an IAYT Yoga Therapist I will be recommending this mat to all my students and private clients

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Design!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality mat!

The quality of the mat is excellent, the rubber backing makes it nice and sturdy and it doesn’t allow the corn to stretch with use. I plan on getting one myself when my current mat wears out! Awesome mat!

product_meta.title: Cork Yoga Mat Non Slip, Eco Friendly & Odor Free - Beautiful Designer Travel Yoga Mat with Carry Strap - Best Bikram & Hot Yoga Mat - 72" x 24" - 4mm Thick
product_meta.description:
There’s nothing worse than practising yoga on a synthetic mat that is bad for your health and the environment. With this in mind, we set out to create a better yoga mat – one that is sustainably made and an absolute pleasure to practice on.

Versatile 
At 72" long, 24" wide, 3 mm thick and weighing under 5lbs, the Valka cork yoga mat provides just the right amount of support while still being lightweight and easy to carry. Suitable for all types of yoga, this yoga mat has the versatility to follow you wherever your practice may take you.

Grippy When Sweaty
Our cork & rubber mat offers amazing grip during sweaty yoga sessions. Thanks to suberin, a natural wax-like substance present in cork, the more you sweat, the better your grip becomes!

Buy a Mat, Plant a Tree
We use Portuguese cork and 100% natural rubber, both of which are sustainably sourced. No trees are cut during the harvesting process. In fact, we plant a tree for every cork yoga mat sold!

Hygienic, Odor Free & Easy to Clean
The foldable cork layer will naturally keep clean and resist all bad odor. For best results, we recommend cleaning the mat once a week with a solution of water and vinegar. Just spray and wipe. Easy as.

Non-Toxic
Most yoga mats are made from synthetic materials which contain harmful chemicals such as PVCs, phthalates, and toxic adhesives. We use only natural rubber, cork and plant based inks. That’s it.

Complimentary Carry Strap 
Every cork yoga mat comes with a durable yoga carry strap that can also be used for stretching and achieving some of those tougher asanas.

After countless hours of testing (and sweating), we are confident that this is the perfect yoga mat for the sweatlife. Add to Cart to experience the joy of practicing yoga on a luxurious cork surface.
feature_bullets: 🕉️ THE GRIP THAT KEEPS ON GIVING – Sticky mats are designed for those who don't sweat. Our cork yoga mats are designed for everyone else. Did you know that cork gets even grippier when you sweat? From moist hands to the hot yoga sweatlife, feel strong and confident in your asanas and smooth in your vinyasas.

🕉️ YOGA, PILATES, EXERCISE – Designed for Yoga, Pilates and everything in between: Ashtanga, Vinyasa Flow, Power, Hatha, Yin, Iyengar, Kundalini, Bikram and Hot Yoga. Flip your cork yoga mat over and use with footwear for gym, HIIT or fitness exercises.

🕉️ TRULY VERSATILE – Perfectly balanced with a dense non-slip 3mm rubber base that firmly grips the floor – a base that is thick enough to provide correct support and comfort, yet light enough to be used as a home, studio or travel yoga mat. The cork mat keeps clean naturally – so you spend more time practicing yoga and less time cleaning.

🕉️ DURABLE AND ECO-FRIENDLY – Built to last from only two sustainable, environmentally friendly, SGS certified materials – recycled cork and natural rubber. Choose a yoga mat that feels like silk against your skin, naturally resists odour, and is better for your health and the environment.
🕉️ SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Each cork yoga mat comes with a complimentary yoga mat strap and is backed by our manufacturer 30 day money back guarantee as well as 1 year free replacement warranty.
